channel.title: SES:FPL on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in SES:FPL on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Vote Clears Path for Thai Tycoon’s Frasers to Privatize REIT
item.description: Frasers Property Ltd., controlled by Thailand’s richest man Charoen Sirivadhanabhakdi, cleared a key hurdle in its pursuit to take private a real estate investment trust.
